oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with David Swett, Jr., 2006 July 17, excerpt 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Nashville businessman David Swett, Jr., conducted on 17 July 2006 by John Egerton as part of a cooperative effort between the Nashville Public Library's Nashville Business Leaders Oral History Project and the Southern Foodways Alliance. Swett discusses his respect for his grandfather, Walter Swett, who encountered racism when starting his businesses. The complete interview, as well as a transcript, is available in the repository.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Swett, David E., 1968- --Interviews; Swett, Walter, 1904-1994
